name: Hero Kill Dead X World
description:
Hero Kill Dead X World is a simple and addicting zombie shooting game with HQ graphics.
The game includes amazing graphics and smooth game controls to enhance your game play experience. Also, this zombie battle game includes multiple game modes to help you feel refreshed.
- Endless Mode
- EASY CONTROLS (Tap to shoot)
- 3D Graphics
- Improve your skills
- More chapters coming soon!
